title: Wimbledon Tennis Break - 3 days
text:
Overview

Shares

The world's most famous tennis Grand Slam

Join us to experience the excitement of one of the most prestigious events of the British summer. On this great-value break you'll enjoy the action of the Junior and Senior matches on No. 1 Court, the taste of strawberries and cream (and even a glass of champagne or Pimms), and the energy of the crowds gathered on the slopes of Henman Hill.



This break takes place over Finals' weekend, and includes a hotel and a reserved seat on the wonderful 11,000-seater No. 1 Court on Sunday, when the stars of tomorrow and the past compete in the Junior and Invitation Events (while the Men's Final takes place on Centre Court). No. 1 Court's new retractable roof means you're guaranteed a great day of tennis whatever the weather. Newmarket Holidays has been officially appointed by The Championships Wimbledon for the sale of No. 1 Court tickets over the Finals Weekend. All images © AELTC 2018

A full day at Wimbledon on Finals Weekend

Gallery

Highlights and Inclusions Two nights' bed and continental breakfast accommodation at a three-star hotel

A reserved seat on No. 1 Court

Return hotel-to-Wimbledon coach transfers

The services of a friendly tour manager

Itinerary Day

1 Make your own way to your hotel where a Newmarket Tour Manager will be available (4pm-6pm) to assist with check-in and provide any assistance you may require. The evening can be spent at leisure in your hotel. Day

2 Following breakfast, you will depart by coach for Wimbledon, arriving at the Championships mid morning. Spend the rest of the day enjoying the action of the world's foremost tennis tournament, until play stops for the day. A coach will be on hand to transfer you back to your hotel. Day

3 After a leisurely breakfast and a relaxed morning, check out of the hotel and make your own way home.
